page.title: 07SUTTON SCHOOL PLAYTIME
page.content:
Two of the chasing games we play in the playground are "IT" and "Stuck-in- the-Mud". "IT" This game is for 2 or more players but we think it is best to have more than 3.One person is "IT" and has to chase all the others.When someone is caught, they become "IT".
STUCK-IN-THE-MUD This is another game for more than 3 people.One person is "IT" and chases the others.When someone is caught they have to stand still and hold their arms out to the sides.That means they are stuck-in-the-mud!Other players have to rescue the stuck people by trying to go under the outstretched arms before being caught. Anyone stuck 3 times becomes "IT".
